[size=5]Installation process[/size]
[img]http://s5.postimg.org/fwc13ry8n/Knightfall_end1.png[/img]
[size=4]Featured mods
[/size][Activate all the mods in the actual listed order & overwrite if asked]

[color=#f1c232][size=6]LòóT
[/size][/color]-LooT and load order-
1.Run LOOT;
2. EDIT META DATA-->SAVE CHANGES;
3. SORT PLUGINS-->APPLY;
4. EXIT LooT;
5. Whatever the mod manager, under the TAB "plugins";
6. Seek "DarkFantasyOverhaul.esp" and "SkyrimFloraOverhaul.esp";
7. Drag them way down below (if not at the end, at least after any weather, texture, flora plugins);
8. In that order:
SkyrimFloraOverhaul.esp
DarkFantasyOverhaul.esp
9. Select both and right-click them;
10. Select "Lock load order" if you can. [i][color=#cc0000][size=1]- IMPORTANT: if this is not applied and the plugins aren't loaded at last, many of their features won't take effect in game like missing trees, textures, etc.[/size][/color][/i]

[size=4]Tweak INI files
[/size]
[i][size=2]Find the following files at this default location: "C:\Users\<username>\Documents\my games\Skyrim"
[/size][/i]
[size=3]Skyrim.ini[/size]
[i]under [Grass] modify/add these lines: 
[/i][color=#000000]iGrassCellRadius=2
bAllowCreateGrass=1
bAllowLoadGrass=0
bGrassPointLighting=1
b30GrassVS=0
iMaxGrassTypesPerTexure=7 [i][size=1]-to 15 if using Verdant-[/size][/i]
iMinGrassSize=40  [i][size=1]-to 70 if using Verdant-[/size][/i][/color]
[size=3]SkyrimPrefs.ini[/size]
[i]modify the following values to 1:[/i]
[color=#000000]bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
bDoDepthofField=0  [i][size=1]- set to 1 to help with water issue if needed -[/size][/i][/color]
[color=#000000]bDrawLandShadows=1[/color]
[color=#000000]bTreesReceiveShadows=1[/color]
[color=#000000]bShadowsOnGrass=1[/color]
[color=#000000]bDeferredShadows=1[/color]
[color=#f4f4f4]For Binary 269+, per Boris,[/color]
[color=#000000]iBlurDeferredShadowMask=3[/color]
[color=#000000]bShadowMaskZPrepass=0[/color]
[color=#000000]bMainZPrepass=0[/color]
[i]also make sure that line looks this way:
[/i][color=#000000]fGamma=1.0000
iMaxAnisotropy=0 [i]--with ENB preset; set to 16 without ENB preset (vanilla)[/i]
iMultiSample=0 [i]--with ENB preset; set to 8 without ENB preset (vanilla)[/i]
[/color]
[i]Find the following file inside you Skyrim main folder, default path:"C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\SteamApps\Common\Skyrim"
[/i][size=3]enblocal.ini[/size]
[i]modify the following lines (after the ENB files are installed):
under [Memory][/i][color=#000000]
ExpandSystemMemoryX64=true [size=1]; [i]false if having 32 bit OS[/i][/size]
ReduceSystemMemoryUsage=true 
DisableDriverMemoryManager=false
DisablePreloadToVRAM=false
EnableUnsafeMemoryHacks=false
ReservedMemorySizeMb=512  [size=1][i];lower is better but I recommend 1/8 of your VRAM[/i][/size]
VideoMemorySizeMb=10246  [size=1]; [i]1GB vram is 1024, 2GB is 2048, 4GB is 4096 - max setable amount is 10246 [VMS=VRAM+RAM-2048][/i][/size]
EnableCompression=true
AutodetectVideoMemorySize=false [size=1];[i] always false because it's always guessing wrong[/i][/size]
[/color]
[i]under [FIX][/i]
[i]*only if you want to use Parallax[/i]
[color=#000000]FixParallaxBugs=true
FixParallaxTerrain=false  [size=1]; set to "true" only if you want parallax texture enable[/size]
FixLag=true [size=1] ; if using a nvidia card[/size][/color][size=1]
[/size]
[size=4]ENB files[/size]
[size=2]1. For each folder(2),[/size][b] Right-click [/b][size=2]on folder[/size][b];[/b]
[b]2. Extract[/b][i] [/i][size=2]to convenient location;[/size]
[size=2]3. Now [/size][b]open[/b][size=2] the latest [/size][i]enb binary[/i][size=2] folder (enbseries_skyrim_v0272);[/size]
[b]4. Copy [/b][size=2]and [/size][b]Paste [/b][size=2]both "d3d9.dll" and "enbhost.exe" from the [/size][i]WrapperVersion[/i][size=2] folder inside [/size][i]The Grim and Somber ENB [/i][size=2]folder;[/size]
[size=2]5. Now [/size][b]open [/b][i]The Grim and Somber ENB folder[/i][size=2];[/size]
[size=2]6. Inside the folder > Select All [/size][u]except[/u][size=2] the [/size][b]DATA[/b][size=2] folder-if there's actually one[/size][b]. [/b]
[b]7. Copy [/b][size=2]and [/size][b]Paste[/b][size=2] the items to your [/size][b]Skyrim main folde[/b][size=2]r[/size][b] - [/b][size=2]Default path: "C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\SteamApps\Common\Skyrim"[/size]
[color=#ff7700][size=4]DO the following only if there's a DATA folder inside the preset[/size][/color]
[size=2]8. Go back within the [/size][i]The Grim and Somber ENB[/i][size=2] folder;[/size]
[size=2]9. Seek the [/size][i]Data [/i][size=2]folder;[/size]
[b]10. Right-click[/b][size=2] on it and [/size][b]select[/b][size=2] the option [/size][i]Add to archive...;[/i]
[size=2]11. Before clicking OK, rename the archive to something convenient like "GRIMSOMBER_data.rar";[/size]
[size=2]12. Finally, [/size][b]drag[/b][size=2] this archive to your mods manager folder 
Nexus mod manager user- Default path: "..\Games\Nexus Mod Manager\Skyrim\Mods"
[/size]Mod Organizer user - Default path: "..\Mod Organizer
[b]13. Open[/b][size=2] your mods manager;[/size]
[b]14. Click on ADD MOD FROM FILE[/b][size=2];[/size]
[size=2]15. Activate GRIMSOMBER_DATA;[/size]
[size=2]16. Run LOOT - EDIT METADATA, SORT PLUGINS.[/size]

[size=4]
VIDEO CARD CONTROL PANEL

[/size]1. Windows start button > Control panel > nvidia control panel
2. Under 'Manage 3D settings';
3. Select a program : Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim (tesv.exe);
4. Set [i]Anisotropic filtering[/i], [i]Antialiasing - Mode[/i] & [i]Vertical Sync[/i] to [b]Application-controlled;
[/b]5. Click APPLY.

[size=4]PLAY![/size]
